definition: to reap without sowing (idiom)
(negative prefix)/not/no
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to catch/to obtain/to capture
to reap/to harvest

sentences.english: Our journey has never been one of short-cuts or settling for less.
sentences.chinese: 我们的征途中从来没有不劳而获或小富即安。

sentences.english: The worst guilt is to accept an unearned guilt.
sentences.chinese: 最严重的罪行是接受一个不劳而获的罪行。

sentences.english: Our company will never afford (free lunch for )the unearned people.
sentences.chinese: 吃白饭，意为不劳而获，吃免费的午餐。

sentences.english: The present system of reaping without sowing should cease immediately.
sentences.chinese: 目前这种不劳而获的制度应当立即废止。

sentences.english: The abolition of incomes unearned by work.
sentences.chinese: 第十一条，取缔不劳而获的收入。

sentences.english: Liu said one of her favorite English mottos is "No one can achieve anything without effort".
sentences.chinese: 刘表示她最喜欢的英语格言是“没有人能不劳而获。”

sentences.english: Nothing to be got without pains but ignorance.
sentences.chinese: 只有无知是可以不劳而获的。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, no amount of happiness can be achieved without hard- working.
sentences.chinese: 同时，没有不劳而获的巨大幸福。

sentences.english: Continue to work with the faith that unearned suffering is redemptive.
sentences.chinese: 继续用信心工作不劳而获的苦楚是赎回的。

sentences.english: Don't be so childish if you think you can get something for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 别这么孩子气，如果你认为你能够不劳而获。

sentences.english: Do you think a copycat is hateful to make achievements out of nothing?
sentences.chinese: 你认为抄袭者不劳而获的行为可恨吗？

sentences.english: No pains no gains, hard work a path to success.
sentences.chinese: 不劳而获，努力工作是通往成功之路。

definition: to love ease and comfort and hate work (idiom)
ill-gotten wealth or gains
to become rich/enrichment
a meat pie falls from the sky (idiom)/to have something fall into your lap
to reap where one has not sown (idiom)
to get rich quick
to seize every opportunity/to be full of tricks
greedy
harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others
a man who is never content is like a snake trying to swallow an elephant (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 xin1 bu4 zu2 she2 tun1 xiang4

definition: to daydream/to indulge in wishful thinking
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
to become rich by one's own efforts/self-made
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
dishonest practices
